effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 570,588.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 570,588.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

Warmongering Gladiator's Satin Mantle

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: When damaged below 30% health, gain a shield for 8 sec which absorbs up to 1.8 million damage.

This effect can only be triggered once every 4 min but is reduced by 12 sec per unique Algari gem color socketed.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 89,983 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,271, further increased by 859 while you remain within its light.
